block.p: Elizabeth Ross Loria, the daughter of Natalie Simes of Boca Raton, Fla., and the late Robert S. Loria, was married last evening to Ricky Scott Janowitz, the son of Sheryl Linden of New York and Sheldon Janowitz of Westbury, N.Y. Rabbi Alan B. Lucas performed the ceremony at Temple Judea in Manhasset, N.Y.
Mrs. Janowitz, 31, is the group manager at Plaza Advertising in New York. She graduated from George Washington University.

Elizabeth Ross Loria, the daughter of Natalie Simes of Boca Raton, Fla., and the late Robert S. Loria, was married last evening to Ricky Scott Janowitz, the son of Sheryl Linden of New York and Sheldon Janowitz of Westbury, N.Y. Rabbi Alan B. Lucas performed the ceremony at Temple Judea in Manhasset, N.Y.
Mrs. Janowitz, 31, is the group manager at Plaza Advertising in New York. She graduated from George Washington University.
Mr. Janowitz, 32, is an executive vice president of International Blind Contractors, a window-shade supplier in New York. He graduated from Boston University.
